text:
Thinknum - https://www.thinknum.com – New York, NY - VISA

Thinknum is changing the way that investors value assets - the media calls us "Github for Finance." We have thousands of analysts using our platform, including many from institutions such as Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley, and Bridgewater. Thinknum just came out of 500 Startups and closed our $1m seed round led by Pejman Mar Ventures. We have been featured in the New York Times, TechCrunch, VentureBeat, and Forbes.

We’re growing quickly and currently hiring engineer number three. You can check out a list of open positions at https://www.thinknum.com/jobs. If you have any questions, please email me at jzhen@thinknum.com.
